meanings.definition: Plural of boeuf: a castrated bull raised for beef
meanings.sent1: The farmer had many boeufs on his ranch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious boeufs for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The boeufs in the field were known for their gentle nature.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a herd of boeufs.
meanings.sent5: The boeufs grazed peacefully under the warm sun.

meanings.definition: Plural of boeuf: a dish made with beef
meanings.sent1: She cooked a tasty boeufs stew for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The boeufs sandwich was a popular choice at the cafe.
meanings.sent3: The boeufs dish was so flavorful, it left everyone wanting more.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the boeufs filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty was a savory boeufs casserole.

meanings.definition: Plural of boeuf: a person who is strong and muscular
meanings.sent1: The wrestler was known as the boeufs of the ring.
meanings.sent2: He admired the boeufs physique of the bodybuilder.
meanings.sent3: The boeufs at the gym lifted weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her as resilient as a boeufs.
meanings.sent5: The boeufs athlete won the competition with ease.
